Structs/THEOAdDescription/LayoutOverride.name: single
Structs/THEOAdDescription/LayoutOverride.abstract: Override to play all ad breaks using the “single” layout mode.

Structs/THEOAdDescription/LayoutOverride.name: lShape
Structs/THEOAdDescription/LayoutOverride.abstract: Override to play all ad breaks using the “L-shape” layout mode.

Structs/THEOAdDescription/LayoutOverride.name: double
Structs/THEOAdDescription/LayoutOverride.abstract: Override to play all ad breaks using the “double” layout mode.

Structs/THEOAdDescription.html#/s:28THEO.name: networkCode
Structs/THEOAdDescription.html#/s:28THEO.abstract: Default network code to use for ad requests.

Structs/THEOAdDescription.html#/s:28THEO.name: customAssetKey
Structs/THEOAdDescription.html#/s:28THEO.abstract: Default custom asset key to use for ad requests.

Structs/THEOAdDescription.html#/s:28THEO.name: backdropDoubleBox
Structs/THEOAdDescription.html#/s:28THEO.abstract: Default backdrop image URL to be used as a background for ads with a double box layout.

Structs/THEOAdDescription.html#/s:28THEO.name: backdropLShape
Structs/THEOAdDescription.html#/s:28THEO.abstract: Default backdrop image URL to be used as a background for ads in L-shape layout.

Structs/THEOAdDescription.html#/s:28THEO.name: overrideLayout
Structs/THEOAdDescription.html#/s:28THEO.abstract: Overrides the layout of all THEOads ad breaks, if set.

Structs/THEOAdDescription.html#/s:28THEO.name: overrideAdSrc
Structs/THEOAdDescription.html#/s:28THEO.abstract: Overrides the ad source of all THEOads ad breaks, if set.

Structs/THEOAdDescription.html#/s:28THEO.name: adTagParameters
Structs/THEOAdDescription.html#/s:28THEO.abstract: The ad tag parameters added to the stream request.

Structs/THEOAdDescription.html#/s:28THEO.name: useId3
Structs/THEOAdDescription.html#/s:28THEO.abstract: Whether to use the ID3-based operating mode.

Structs/THEOAdDescription/LayoutOverride.name: LayoutOverride
Structs/THEOAdDescription/LayoutOverride.abstract: Describes how and when the layout of a THEOads ad break should be overridden.

Protocols/THEOadsIntegration.html#/s:28T.name: replaceAdTagParams(params:)
Protocols/THEOadsIntegration.html#/s:28T.abstract: Replaces all of the ad tag parameters used for upcoming ad requests

Protocols/THEOadsIntegration.html.name: THEOadsIntegration
Protocols/THEOadsIntegration.html.abstract: Integration to enable TheoAds on a THEOplayer
